column1: To The Beat Tight 24" lululemon X SoulCycle
column6: Please add drawstring to all your leggings! Loved everything about it, except it didn't have a drawstring, that's the deal breaker for me unfortunately.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey MonicaM93,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your To The Beat Tight 24" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 6, 2019'}

column1: To The Beat Tight 24" lululemon X SoulCycle
column6: I’m 5’3” and 140lbs. I bought these in a size 6 and a size 8. They both “fit”, but I thought I would be more comfortable in the waist with the size 8. I’ve washed and worn these a few times now. No pilling or loose seams! I do wish I had kept the size 6 in retrospect. Although the waist doesn’t fall down when I ride, I feel like the pants have loosened up in the knee area. Overall, a great buy!

column1: To The Beat Tight 24" lululemon X SoulCycle
column5: Better Rides. Tap back with ease. (I mean, tap backs are never easy but they felt way better in these pants!)
column6: I'm pretty sure I've ever written a review before in my life but I felt like I needed to tell people how much I love these pants. Went from Pure Barre to SoulCycle and these pants were perfect. The stitched seams are flattering and thoughtfully placed to not get in the way of your movements. *HIGHLY RECOMMEND* making the investment!
